title: WealthHealth
subtitle: WealthHealt is a company that uses an internal web application, called HRnet, which manages employee records.
description: Pass a jQuery library to React.
objectif: Convert the entire jQuery project to React. Convert one of the four current jQuery plugins to React. Replace the remaining 3 jQuery plugins with React components.

title: ArgentBank
subtitle: bank service allowing customers to login on their website and to manage their bank accounts and their profile.
description: Use an API for a bank user account with React.
objectif: API integration in a React app, use of Redux for global state management, and creation of future endpoints with Swagger.

title: SportSee
subtitle: Startup dedicated to sports coaching.
description: The page will allow the user to follow the number of sessions performed as well as the number of calories burned
objectif: Build an analytics dashboard with React

title: Kasa
subtitle: Kasa has been in the business of renting apartments between individuals for nearly 10 years now.
description: KASA Getting Started with Create React App.
objectif: Develop a web application with React and React Router.

title: Les petits plats
subtitle: After publishing cookbooks for several years, the company decided to embark on a new project: to create its own cooking recipe site.
description: Les petits plats is a cooking recipe search application, users can search recipes related to ingredients, utensils and equipment.
objectif: Develop a search algorithm in JavaScript

title: FishEye
subtitle: Website that allows freelance photographers to showcase their best work.
description: The project consists of building a working prototype of a new website and providing all the HTML, CSS and JavaScript needed for the prototype.
objectif: Create a responsive website with Javascript.

title: Ohmyfood
subtitle: Ohmyfood! is a young startup that would like to impose itself on the catering market.
description: The goal is to develop a 100% mobile site that lists the menus of gourmet restaurants.In addition to traditional reservation systems, customers will be able to compose their meal menu so that the dishes are ready when they arrive. No more waiting times at the restaurant!
objectif: Create a site prototype by integrating the model designed by the UI designer, in HTML and CSS. The site is responsive.

title: Reservia
subtitle: Vacation planning website
description: Reservia is a small company offering a vacation planning tool. The site allows users to find accommodation and activities in the city of their choice.
objectif: Create a site prototype by integrating the model designed by the UI designer, in HTML and CSS. The site is responsive.
